issues_detected.title: Post.timestamp default callable
issues_detected.cause: Using datetime.utcnow() evaluated at import time resulted in identical timestamps; replaced with datetime.utcnow callable
issues_detected.fix: Use default=datetime.utcnow (no parentheses) so the timestamp is evaluated per-insert

issues_detected.title: Post.user_id foreign key and relationship
issues_detected.cause: Missing db.ForeignKey and backref prevented ORM from linking Post and User correctly
issues_detected.fix: Set user_id = db.Column(db.Integer, db.ForeignKey('user.id'), nullable=False) and add backref='author' on User.posts
